duties_responsibilities.duty: Sell the entire suite of NetSuite products: ERP, CRM, e-commerce, EPM, and HCM through prospecting, lead qualification, forecasting, and planning.
Manage sales activities with support from a Business Development Representative to secure new business.
Develop solution proposals encompassing all aspects of the business applications and participate in the creation, presentation, and sale of a complete value proposition.
Participate in customer meetings via telephone, internet, and in-person to present and sell the value proposition.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 3 years of SaaS/Technology sales experience.
